interpretation: The "cloud with lightning" card represents a sudden and powerful change that is about to occur in your life. This change may come unexpectedly, like a bolt of lightning from a stormy sky. It may be a transformative experience that shakes up your entire world, bringing with it the energy and power to propel you forward. However, this card also serves as a warning to be prepared for any upheaval that may come your way. You may need to adapt quickly and embrace the change in order to avoid negative consequences. Remember that with great power comes great responsibility, and it's up to you to harness the energy of this card in a positive way. Trust that you have the strength and resilience to weather any storm and emerge stronger than before.
